article.name: doom
article.contents:
--- class: Thaumaturgist name: Doom school: Curse rank: 3 type: Debilitation brief: Curse an enemy to wither away, harm themselves, or fail at all endeavors ---
At-will, std, ranged, 3 vitae; you lay a curse upon the subject. Choose one: - Doom of the Body: each round, the subject's max HP lowers by 25%. - Doom of the Double-Edged Sword: each time the subject inflicts damage, they inflict equal unblockable damage to a randomly chosen ally or themself. - Doom of Failure: subject suffers -1 to all rolls. On each turn start, this penalty doubles.
article.bodyHtml:
At-will, std, ranged, 3 vitae; you lay a curse upon the subject. Choose one:

  • Doom of the Body: each round, the subject's max HP lowers by 25%.
  • Doom of the Double-Edged Sword: each time the subject inflicts damage, they inflict equal unblockable damage to a randomly chosen ally or themself.
  • Doom of Failure: subject suffers -1 to all rolls. On each turn start, this penalty doubles.
